== <span style="font-family:'Times New Roman',Times,serif; font-size: 150%; color:darkslategray">Dosage Forms of ''$this.label$''</span> ==

<br/>

{{#widget: TableResult |
query='SELECT ?DosageForm WHERE {
?? <http://www4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de/drugbank/resource/drugbank/dosageForm> ?DosageForm . }'
}}

<br/>

== <span style="font-family:'Times New Roman',Times,serif; font-size: 150%; color:darkred">Interaction drugs for ''$this.label$''</span> ==

<br/>

{{#widget: TableResult |
query='SELECT ?Drug ?TypeOfInteraction WHERE { 
?interaction <http://www4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de/drugbank/resource/drugbank/interactionDrug1> ?Drug. 
?interaction <http://www4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de/drugbank/resource/drugbank/interactionDrug2> ?? . 
?interaction <http://www4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de/drugbank/resource/drugbank/text> ?TypeOfInteraction }'
}}

<br/>

== <span style="font-family:'Times New Roman',Times,serif; font-size: 150%; color:chocolate">MoleculeMass of Interaction drugs of ''$this.label$''</span> ==

{{ #widget : BarChart
  | input = 'Drug'
  | output = {{ 'MolecularWeightAverage' }}
  | query = '
SELECT ?Drug ?MolecularWeightAverage WHERE {
?interaction <http://www4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de/drugbank/resource/drugbank/interactionDrug1> ?Drug. 
?interaction <http://www4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de/drugbank/resource/drugbank/interactionDrug2> ?? . 
?Drug <http://www4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de/drugbank/resource/drugbank/molecularWeightAverage> ?MolecularWeightAverage }
ORDER BY DESC(?MolecularWeightAverage)
'
  | type = 'BAR_CLUSTERED'
  | historic = false
}}

<br/>

== <span style="font-family:'Times New Roman',Times,serif; font-size: 150%; color:indigo">Experimental logP of Interaction drugs of ''$this.label$''</span> ==

{{ #widget : LineChart
  | input = 'drug'
  | output = {{ 'logP' }}
  | query = '
SELECT ?drug ?logP WHERE { 
?interaction <http://www4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de/drugbank/resource/drugbank/interactionDrug1> ?drug. 
?interaction <http://www4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de/drugbank/resource/drugbank/interactionDrug2> ?? . 
?drug <http://www4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de/drugbank/resource/drugbank/experimentalLogpHydrophobicity> ?logP  }
ORDER BY DESC(?logP)
'
  | historic = false
}}
